question: i run ubuntu on my home pc, but im not at home and on a windows machine.. and it seems to be infected with virus's... im wanting to do some work from this pc but be safe. hope that makes sense
Ubuntu won't get infected just because Windows has a virus
the rule with computers is there's no black magic
Windows programs don't run on Ubuntu
Viruses, trojans, and spyware are windows programs
Therefore viruses, trojans and spyware won't run on Ubuntu
Again, no black magic
